summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LeadFlow Genius SaaS MVP. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend mostly working with one minor JavaScript error in Email Campaigns component. All core features including AI-powered email generation, lead scraping simulation, CRM, and analytics are working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript error: 'business_name is not defined' causing error boundary to trigger
ui_bugs.impact: Error boundary shows but functionality appears to work

passed_tests: Dashboard analytics loading with 237 leads, 1 campaign, 3 emails sent
Lead scraper form filling and simulation (81 leads generated)
Lead scraper progress tracking and results display
CRM leads table with 237 leads and status management
AI agent email generation using GPT-4o (Emergent LLM)
Settings page profile and API key management
Mock data generation for scraping and email campaigns
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix JavaScript error in EmailCampaigns component where 'business_name' variable is not defined. This is causing an error boundary to trigger but doesn't break core functionality.
